body_html:
@shibatch thanks, I build/install using "python setup.py install" , how/where would I specify the flag you suggest ?
I manually did the build in third_party/sleef/build with the flag you suggested and it worked. So, only thing now is to place the flag somewhere in the pytorch build.

body:
